item.title: CVE-2024-32428|2024-04-15T06:29:54.433Z -- Moss Web Works -- MWW Disclaimer Buttons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Moss Web Works MWW Disclaimer Buttons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects MWW Disclaimer Buttons: from n/a through 3.0.2.
